name: Shoot 'N Hockey
description:
A game made during a local edition of Ludum Dare 41 Game Jam organised by Digital Night Studio in Łódź, Poland.

Shoot 'N Hockey is a brilliant combination of a shooter and a sports game where two players compete against each other in a hockey game. With their versatile assault rifles, equipped with both hockey stick attachment and banana launcher, they struggle to score points avoiding obstacles!
